meanings.sent1: The endotracheal procedure involves placing a tube inside the trachea.
meanings.sent2: The doctor used an endotracheal tube to help the patient breathe.
meanings.sent3: The endotracheal tube decided to take a cozy nap inside the trachea.
meanings.sent4: Her voice echoed like an endotracheal whisper in the silence of the room.
meanings.sent5: The endotracheal image of the tube inside the trachea stayed in his mind.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to a tube inserted into the trachea for medical purposes.
meanings.sent1: The endotracheal tube was carefully inserted by the skilled medical team.
meanings.sent2: After surgery, the patient was connected to an endotracheal ventilator.
meanings.sent3: The endotracheal tube threw a surprise party inside the trachea.
meanings.sent4: His words flowed smoothly, like an endotracheal tube guiding air into the lungs.
meanings.sent5: The endotracheal tube gleamed under the bright hospital lights, ready to assist.
